entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Show only a single suggestion adornment for a multi-line string #70005
  • AddParameterCheck/InitializeMemberFromParameter refactorings should be resilient to the presence of IOperation nodes for compiler generated MyBase.New call #70004
  • NRE from ReceiverIsSubjectToCloning while working in Roslyn.sln #69997
  • Formatting operations fail to account for adaptive formatting #69995
  • C# IDE0250 suggestion (make struct readonly) can cause CS8342 error (readonly struct can't contain field-like events) #69994
    Backlog
  • Open square bracket forcing a new line #69993
  • Adjusting namespaces after moving a file between folders removes parentheses in logical expressions #69992
  • Why does code clean up automatically implement interfaces #69991
  • Roslyn fails to detect null assignments inside 'foreach' #69989
    17.9
  • Analyzer suggestion `IDE0305` ("Collection initialization can be simplified") leads to performance regressions #69988
  • Cancelling a source control checkout operation during refactoring produces visible errors #69987
  • Read-only files cause exceptions in several IDE components during refactoring #69986
  • `CS0101` does not hint about partial declarations when finding a conflict with two non-namespaces #69985
    Backlog

Closed

  • Update ICSharpCode.Decompiler to 8.1.1 #69982
  • "Navigate To" feature frequently crashes #69234
    17.8 P2
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34118.122 #69996
  • Surrogate pairs not recognized in identifiers. #13474
    Backlog
  • Confusing ref escape analysis (CS8168, CS8347) #69990
  • Sporadic NullReferenceException in CSharpDataSetDataTableInSerializableObjectGraphAnalyzer #69945
  • In Roslyn have TreatWarningsAsErrors enabled for compilation but not for analysis #16535
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoid calling GetMembersUnordered for substituted types #70003
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update Razor to 8.0.0-preview.23465.2 #70002
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2270257 #70000
  • Move methods to more appropriate file #69999
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Do not offer 'make struct readonly' when events are present #69998
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Update ICSharpCode.Decompiler to consume important bug fix #70001
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Speicfy System.Private.Uri and System.Net.Http versions #69959
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Make ManagedToolTask.PathToManagedTool virtual #69958
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Optimize `T ?? null` to `T` where `T` is a reference type #69803
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Remove unnecessary feeds #69928
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Add new endpoint in roslyn to get token for multiple ranges #69946
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • [Performance] Avoid 1GB of Enumerator boxing allocations #69972
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.9
  • [Performance] Avoid 500MB of HashSet enumerator allocations calling `Any` #69973
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.9
  • Add mitigation in 17.7 for cases where local and remote host disagree on source generated files. #69965
    Area-IDE, untriaged, OnDeckForServicing
  • Use no-op global assembly cache helper when running under .net core #69936
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Perform a null check for a pattern-based fixed statement over nullable value type. #69957
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.8
  • [Performance] Reduce array allocations of BadArguments #69970
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.9
